items.sentence: Tom is the best French speaker in our family.

I want the rest of the money that you owe me.
I want you to help me do that this afternoon.

We\'ve looked everywhere and can\'t find Tom.
I can\'t believe it\'s been more than a year.

Tom doesn\'t know as much about this as I do.
